import './Planform.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Header from '../header/Header'; import { useState } from 'react'; //use axios for passing data to backend const Planform = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ userName: '', password: '' }); const login = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); fetch("http://localhost:4000/register/planform", { method: 'PUT', headers: new Headers({ 'Authorization': 'Basic ' + encode(user) }) }) } return ( <>
